pmlib_cpuidle.h File Reference
CPU Idle Configuration

This file declares the interface for CPU Idle functionality. This is is a low latency power saving mode which allows fast wakeup depending on the power mode set. More...

#include <ti/drv/pm/include/pm_types.h>
#include <ti/drv/pm/include/prcm/pmhal_prcm.h>

Detailed Description

This file declares the interface for CPU Idle functionality. This is is a low latency power saving mode which allows fast wakeup depending on the power mode set.
